attributes.action: , in light of the expenses scandal, dissolve Parliament immediately and call a General Election for the earliest possible date.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of the recent revalations about MPs expenses, and the
considerable damage to Parliament's reputation this has caused, many citizens believe the
only sensible action the Prime Minister can take to help restore
confidence in our political system is to let the public chose a new
government at a General Election. It is not uncommon for Governments
to lose the support of the electorate between elections, but for that
to happen to an entire Parliament is unprecidented. Surely, remedial action
must be taken immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
